00036 void RunCommand( std::string command ){

00040 /* @brief Count the lines of a textfile */
00046 unsigned GetLineNumber(std::string filename){
00047   std::ifstream infile(filename.c_str());
00048   if(!infile)
00049     return 0;
00050   unsigned i = 0;
00051   std::string sd;
00052   while(getline(infile,sd) && sd.size()>0)
00053     ++i;
00054 
00055   infile.close();
00056   return i;
00057 }
00058 
00059 /* @brief Reverse a string */
00065 void reverse(char s[])
00066 {
00067   int c, i, j;
00068 
00069   for (i = 0, j = strlen(s)-1; i<j; i++, j--) {
00070     c = s[i];
00071     s[i] = s[j];
00072     s[j] = c;
00073   }
00074 }
00075 
00076 /* \brief Conversion int -> char[] */
00083 void itoa(int n, char s[])
00084 {
00085   int i, sign;
00086 
00087   if ((sign = n) < 0)  /* record sign */
00088     n = -n;          /* make n positive */
00089   i = 0;
00090   do {       /* generate digits in reverse order */
00091     s[i++] = n % 10 + '0';   /* get next digit */
00092   } while ((n /= 10) > 0);     /* delete it */
00093   if (sign < 0)
00094     s[i++] = '-';
00095   s[i] = '\0';
00096   reverse(s);
00097 }

00099 /* \brief Conversion int -> std::string */
00105 std::string IntToString(int intValue) {
00106   char *myBuff;
00107   std::string strRetVal;
00108   myBuff = new char[100];
00109   memset(myBuff,'\0',100);
00110 
00111   itoa(intValue,myBuff);
00112 
00113   strRetVal = myBuff;
00114   delete[] myBuff;
00115   return(strRetVal);
00116 }

00118 /* \brief returns folder position */
00124 std::string Folder(std::string where){
00125   std::string folder_amd="/home/psteger/astro/amd/";
00126   std::string folder_snaps = folder_amd+"snap/";
00127   std::string folder_amateur = folder_amd+"amateur/";
00128   std::string folder_output = folder_amd+"output/";
00129 
00130   if(where=="amd")
00131     return folder_amd;
00132   else if(where=="snaps")
00133     return folder_snaps;
00134   else if(where=="amateur")
00135     return folder_amateur;
00136   else if(where=="output")
00137     return folder_output;
00138   else
00139     {
00140       std::cout << "Folder " << where << " not found, returning folder of amd!";
00141       return folder_amd;
00142     }
00143 }
